name: heccibiggs
text:
What on earth makes you think this would go down well here.

No, wait, I already know the answer to that - you're not looking for approval, you're being a dick on purpose, you like to stir up shit, yadda yadda yadda. Let's make no bones about it, you're a cunt.

name: trollcollins
text: He is both a dick and a cunt! He is the hermaphrodite of poor social skills!

name: linning
text:
As much as pointing out people's spelling errors is straight up a dick move, the fact that the holmes here misspelt "unintelligible" is excellent.

Also, there is nothing better than a lady who freely uses the word cunt. I hate that people hate it.

name: cryztal
text:
Cunt is only the most badass word ever.

Has anyone ever been called a cunt and not cried?

name: krispykorn
text: well coordinated, with your picture of beef crying and all.

name: belgand
text: Scots?

name: cryztal
text: Unfair. Scots don't have tear ducts.

name: belgand
text: True, but they're also fairly used to be called cunts and calling others cunts in a friendly fashion. Well, 'til someone gets chibbed. But that is their way.

name: aliiis
text: so very chubbied

name: belgand
text:
"All I need to know about Scotland I learned from reading and watching Trainspotting "

Perhaps best summed up by "It's SHITE being Scottish!"

Then again all the Scots I've never known have been wonderful people, but I think going off of stereotypes from fiction is the best way. That's the American way!

name: overmedicated
text: It's alright for you, you don't have to live next to them.

name: soticoto
text:
I'm half-Scottish.
Did I just prove you half-wrong?

name: belgand
text: No, just half-mast. Care to salute?

name: dusty
text: I called this guy from argentina a cunt once and he didn't cry, actually he kicked me down some stairs and then jumped on me about the time I hit the bottom. Then I head butted him in the nose and got up, kicked him in the ribs and ran off. His eyes teared up a bit, but he wasn't crying. At least he insisted that he hadn't been crying when we were chatting the next day while we were standing with the pastor waiting for my sister to come down the aisle.

name: cryztal
text: Well sir, I stand corrected and ashamed.

name: dusty
text: Your avatar makes this so sincere.

name: cryztal
text: It is an avatar that is capable of expressing a multitude of emotions (except perhaps sexual arousal or joy). I use it for everything. Some day I'll just print it out, paste it on my face and walk around like that for the rest of my life.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you hate me.

name: soticoto
text: You were quite right there. I apologise for my grievous error.

name: soticoto
text:
Well, I never thought it would go down well... but I felt a certain degree of righteous indignation at Showbiz and his ignorant ways, and seeing someone praising him for it pushed me a tad far.

And honestly no... I don't try to stir up shit, but I do enjoy it somewhat when it happens.

name: atticusonline
text:
you and asherdan must hang out alot

good lord, we have our own Pat and Showbiz.

text:
Holy hell i lived with a guy like Showbiz for like 2 years and i am not even kidding.

He was all "Immigrants"

text: I was on the ping pong team of a guy called Showbiz last weekend. When he talked he murmered through a drunk beard, and after a while i realised he was patronizing me.

text: Even though it's the same font size and capitalized, existing outside a word balloon such as it does, the "POW!" looks like it is being stated very quietly.

name: lateadopter
text: Showbiz is like Todd with the ability to read and without the industry to run smack.

name: norrin
text: What that really translates to is that Todd is essentially self reliant. While knowing a crazy guy can be an imposition, knowing a crazy guy who needs your help all the time straight up sucks. Especially if he's your brother and you feel obligated to bail him out.

text:
... me ?
damn you, fingers (i have no problems with bbcode, though)

Right angle - you are the... angle of the week.

name: stuart

name: tekende
text: The best part is that he's wrong. It's all DVR these days, not Tivo.

name: aplomb
text: And on the second day, Tim Berners-Lee created the hilarious lingo filter.

name: gormster
text: The first thing Tim Berners-Lee did was invent the web.

name: tekende
text: You mean it wasn't Al Gore?

name: ttagxamm
text:
Really excellent use of panel framing here, to underscore just how out of kilter Showbiz is, and how he threatens to drag Beef askew.

This is kinda heavy but here's a thought: behind all of Showbiz's bluster is the wish for his older brother's love and admiration, and part of Beef's reaction in those tilted final panels is the twinge of pain and regret that comes of knowing that no amount of love can really help Showbiz very much. Just as no loan is gonna keep Showbiz out of collections for long.

name: nigelchaos
text: Psychology Major?

name: ttagxamm
text: I think you mean that to be a compliment, so thanks.  And, no, I wasn't a pyschology major.  Let's just say that every family has its circumstances and leave it at that.

name: nigelchaos
text: Yeah. I wasn't trying to be snide. Very well thought out. :-)

text: Showbiz = Job from Arrested Development.

text:
anybody else notice the hand gesture showbiz makes in panel 10?

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Friday party, naturally!

name: cagliostro
text:
There is something wonderfully poignant about the definition of 'life' as a signal in our cells saying:
GO
GO ON
GO
MORE FUN
GO
even if Ray was high when he came up with it.

name: trumbot
text: I appreciate the Greatest Hits we get at the end, seeing as all I really want to see is Roast Beef scrunch up his face in response to this torture.

name: charchar
text:
If I give this a 3 I can bring down the rating .1, but I don't want to give it a 3. The temptation is staggering...

Also, Showbiz is a cockhead.

name: direhaggis
text: There was a time in my life where I knew a lot of people in situations like panels 5-8. They would be filled with notions that were fun, mildly absurd, inexplicably falling asleep in perverse hours and circumstances. They knew "the Edge... there is no honest way to explain it because the only people who really know where it is are the ones who have gone over." And in candy-colored vessels of every choice imaginable and mixable, their flotilla set out to sea, only to be smacked by the sun a few brief times before carousing over the horizon--lost to the good movie one hour too long back on the shore.

name: ttagxamm
text: I'm not certain that I grasp what you are reaching for, but I like this.

name: tekende
text: Except Showbiz doesn't know the edge. He's never come close to going over it, and he knows that, but he'll pretend as hard as he can; others will recognize this but be too polite to say anything.

name: baryonyx
text: It drives me up the wall when people lump "internet" into one category. People always go "Well you're good with computers, right?" and I'm like "Yes, I can type in Microsoft Word, don't ask me to code your website for you."

name: feetnotes
text: Beef's futon looks just like the one he had the first time he went to heaven.

name: mrectomy
text:
"Let's go to a nude beach, man! I'm serious!"

Funny 'cause RB is already nude.

SO nude.

text: i can't give this even a medium rating 'cos i feel so bad for Beef...

text:
When you know a Showbiz, every day is Christmas!
Also you want to push him down the stairs and then shit on him because he basically the worst man in the history of the world ever.

text:
I'm surprised Showbiz didn't find himself targeted for violence thanks to that mustache, especially in Mexico.

Makes him bear a strong resemblance to Jaime.

text: I can't give out enough chubbies for this page ): this is not fair, there are so many excellent comments here.
